mapper.select: select c.*, c.member_id from Calendar c, member m where c.member_id = m.member_id and m.member_id=#{member_id}
mapper.update: update Calendar set calendar_title = #{CALENDAR_TITLE}, calendar_content = #{CALENDAR_CONTENT}, calendar_color = #{CALENDAR_COLOR} where CALENDAR_ID = #{CALENDAR_ID}
mapper.select: select count(*) from calendar where MEMBER_id = #{MEMBER_id} and sysdate between to_date(CALENDAR_START, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') and to_date(CALENDAR_END, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS')
